ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are grateful to Dr. Niranjan Kumar Sana, Professor, Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, University of Rajshahi, Rajshahi-6205, Bangladesh for providing his thoughts and guidance. The authors are also grateful to Pharmacology laboratory, Department of Pharmacy, Jashore University of Science and Technology, Jashore- 7408, Bangladesh and Asia Arsenic Network, Jessore â€“Benapole Road, Jessore, Bangladesh, for providing their laboratory facilities to conduct this research.
